Operation 'getFeedConnections' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original description is vague about what 'appropriate options' means and doesn't specify return format or pagination. Added clarity about filtering capabilities, return type (paginated FeedConnection objects), and authentication requirement for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_summary: Searches for feed connections
data.current_description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for available feed connections in the system.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve feed connections with optional filtering
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of feed connections established between Xero and financial institutions. Supports filtering and pagination through query parameters. Returns a paginated collection of FeedConnection objects containing connection details, status, and metadata. Requires OAuth2 authentication.
data.reasoning: Original description is vague about what 'appropriate options' means and doesn't specify return format or pagination. Added clarity about filtering capabilities, return type (paginated FeedConnection objects), and authentication requirement for AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'createFeedConnections' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original summary has grammatical issue ('feed connection' should be plural). Description lacks information about return value, side effects (establishes data feed pipeline), and partnership requirement context. Enhanced for AI agents to understand the operation's significance and prerequisites.

data.current_summary: Create one or more new feed connection
data.current_description: By passing in the FeedConnections array object in the body, you can create one or more new feed connections
data.description_suggestion: Creates one or more new feed connections between Xero and financial institutions. Accepts a FeedConnections array in the request body containing connection configuration details. Returns HTTP 202 Accepted with connection identifiers and status. Establishes the data feed pipeline for bank statement ingestion. Requires OAuth2 authentication and financial services partnership.
data.reasoning: Original summary has grammatical issue ('feed connection' should be plural). Description lacks information about return value, side effects (establishes data feed pipeline), and partnership requirement context. Enhanced for AI agents to understand the operation's significance and prerequisites.

message: Operation 'getFeedConnection' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Summary is clear and actionable. Description is confusing ('FeedConnection Id options' is unclear) and doesn't specify return format or error handling. Clarified parameter usage, return object structure, and HTTP status codes for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_summary: Retrieve single feed connection based on a unique id provided
data.current_description: By passing in a FeedConnection Id options, you can search for matching feed connections
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a single feed connection by its unique identifier. Accepts a FeedConnection ID as a path parameter. Returns a FeedConnection object containing connection details including status, financial institution information, and configuration metadata. Returns HTTP 200 on success or HTTP 404 if the connection ID is not found. Requires OAuth2 authentication.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and actionable. Description is confusing ('FeedConnection Id options' is unclear) and doesn't specify return format or error handling. Clarified parameter usage, return object structure, and HTTP status codes for better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'deleteFeedConnections' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_context, missing_side_effects. Summary doesn't indicate batch capability. Description lacks context about asynchronous processing (202 response), side effects (stops data ingestion), and the special DeleteRequests endpoint pattern. Enhanced to clarify batch deletion, async nature, and operational consequences for AI agents.

data.current_summary: Delete an existing feed connection
data.current_description: By passing in FeedConnections array object in the body, you can delete a feed connection.
data.summary_suggestion: Delete one or more feed connections
data.description_suggestion: Deletes one or more existing feed connections by submitting a FeedConnections array in the request body. Returns HTTP 202 Accepted indicating asynchronous deletion processing. Terminating a feed connection stops all bank statement data ingestion from the associated financial institution. Requires OAuth2 authentication. Note: This operation uses the DeleteRequests endpoint for batch deletion.
data.reasoning: Summary doesn't indicate batch capability. Description lacks context about asynchronous processing (202 response), side effects (stops data ingestion), and the special DeleteRequests endpoint pattern. Enhanced to clarify batch deletion, async nature, and operational consequences for AI agents.

message: Operation 'getStatements' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary 'Retrieve all statements' is misleading since the operation supports filtering. Description is too vague about what parameters do. Added clarity about parameter count, filtering capabilities, return format (paginated Statement objects), and HTTP status for AI agent understanding.

data.current_summary: Retrieve all statements
data.current_description: By passing in parameters, you can search for matching statements
data.summary_suggestion: Search statements with filtering and pagination
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves bank statements with optional filtering and pagination. Accepts up to 4 query parameters for filtering by feed connection, date range, status, or other criteria. Returns a paginated collection of Statement objects containing transaction lines, balances, and reconciliation data. Returns HTTP 200 on success. Requires OAuth2 authentication.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Retrieve all statements' is misleading since the operation supports filtering. Description is too vague about what parameters do. Added clarity about parameter count, filtering capabilities, return format (paginated Statement objects), and HTTP status for AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'createStatements' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is clear but description is completely missing. Added comprehensive description explaining input format, return status, asynchronous processing, purpose (bank reconciliation), and authentication requirements. Critical for AI agents to understand this operation's role in the bank feeds workflow.

data.current_summary: Creates one or more new statements
data.description_suggestion: Creates one or more new bank statements for ingestion into Xero. Accepts a Statements array in the request body containing statement details including transactions, balances, and reconciliation information. Returns HTTP 202 Accepted with statement identifiers and processing status. Statements are asynchronously processed and matched to feed connections for bank reconciliation. Requires OAuth2 authentication and valid feed connection configuration.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear but description is completely missing. Added comprehensive description explaining input format, return status, asynchronous processing, purpose (bank reconciliation), and authentication requirements. Critical for AI agents to understand this operation's role in the bank feeds workflow.

message: Operation 'getStatement' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Summary is clear and actionable. Description is misleading ('search for matching statements' suggests multiple results when only one is returned). Clarified that it retrieves a single statement, specified return object structure including key fields (balances, transactions, currency), and documented HTTP status codes for AI agent clarity.

data.current_summary: Retrieve single statement based on unique id provided
data.current_description: By passing in a statement id, you can search for matching statements
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a single bank statement by its unique identifier. Accepts a statement ID as a path parameter. Returns a Statement object containing transaction lines, starting and ending balances, currency, and reconciliation metadata. Returns HTTP 200 on success or HTTP 404 if the statement ID is not found. Requires OAuth2 authentication.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and actionable. Description is misleading ('search for matching statements' suggests multiple results when only one is returned). Clarified that it retrieves a single statement, specified return object structure including key fields (balances, transactions, currency), and documented HTTP status codes for AI agent clarity.

Operation 'getFeedConnections' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Added clarity about filtering capabilities, return type (paginated FeedConnection objects), and authentication requirement for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_summary: Searches for feed connections
data.current_description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for available feed connections in the system.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve feed connections with optional filtering
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of feed connections established between Xero and financial institutions. Supports filtering and pagination through query parameters. Returns a paginated collection of FeedConnection objects containing connection details, status, and metadata. Requires OAuth2 authentication.
data.reasoning: Original description is vague about what 'appropriate options' means and doesn't specify return format or pagination. Added clarity about filtering capabilities, return type (paginated FeedConnection objects), and authentication requirement for AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'createFeedConnections' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original summary has grammatical issue ('feed connection' should be plural). Description lacks information about return value, side effects (establishes data feed pipeline), and partnership requirement context. Enhanced for AI agents to understand the operation's significance and prerequisites.

data.current_summary: Create one or more new feed connection
data.current_description: By passing in the FeedConnections array object in the body, you can create one or more new feed connections
data.description_suggestion: Creates one or more new feed connections between Xero and financial institutions. Accepts a FeedConnections array in the request body containing connection configuration details. Returns HTTP 202 Accepted with connection identifiers and status. Establishes the data feed pipeline for bank statement ingestion. Requires OAuth2 authentication and financial services partnership.
data.reasoning: Original summary has grammatical issue ('feed connection' should be plural). Description lacks information about return value, side effects (establishes data feed pipeline), and partnership requirement context. Enhanced for AI agents to understand the operation's significance and prerequisites.

message: Operation 'getFeedConnection' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Summary is clear and actionable. Description is confusing ('FeedConnection Id options' is unclear) and doesn't specify return format or error handling. Clarified parameter usage, return object structure, and HTTP status codes for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_summary: Retrieve single feed connection based on a unique id provided
data.current_description: By passing in a FeedConnection Id options, you can search for matching feed connections
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a single feed connection by its unique identifier. Accepts a FeedConnection ID as a path parameter. Returns a FeedConnection object containing connection details including status, financial institution information, and configuration metadata. Returns HTTP 200 on success or HTTP 404 if the connection ID is not found. Requires OAuth2 authentication.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and actionable. Description is confusing ('FeedConnection Id options' is unclear) and doesn't specify return format or error handling. Clarified parameter usage, return object structure, and HTTP status codes for better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'deleteFeedConnections' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_context, missing_side_effects. Summary doesn't indicate batch capability. Description lacks context about asynchronous processing (202 response), side effects (stops data ingestion), and the special DeleteRequests endpoint pattern. Enhanced to clarify batch deletion, async nature, and operational consequences for AI agents.

data.current_summary: Delete an existing feed connection
data.current_description: By passing in FeedConnections array object in the body, you can delete a feed connection.
data.summary_suggestion: Delete one or more feed connections
data.description_suggestion: Deletes one or more existing feed connections by submitting a FeedConnections array in the request body. Returns HTTP 202 Accepted indicating asynchronous deletion processing. Terminating a feed connection stops all bank statement data ingestion from the associated financial institution. Requires OAuth2 authentication. Note: This operation uses the DeleteRequests endpoint for batch deletion.
data.reasoning: Summary doesn't indicate batch capability. Description lacks context about asynchronous processing (202 response), side effects (stops data ingestion), and the special DeleteRequests endpoint pattern. Enhanced to clarify batch deletion, async nature, and operational consequences for AI agents.

data.current_summary: Retrieve all statements

data.summary_suggestion: Search statements with filtering and pagination
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves bank statements with optional filtering and pagination. data.current_summary: Creates one or more new statements
data.description_suggestion: Creates one or more new bank statements for ingestion into Xero. Accepts a Statements array in the request body containing statement details including transactions, balances, and reconciliation information. Returns HTTP 202 Accepted with statement identifiers and processing status. Statements are asynchronously processed and matched to feed connections for bank reconciliation. Requires OAuth2 authentication and valid feed connection configuration.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a single bank statement by its unique identifier. Accepts a statement ID as a path parameter.
